plot: A girl, who is in love with a man, refuses to enter an arranged marriage with someone else. When her beloved goes to war, she decides to enter a monastery, where she dies.
title: Makrya ap' ton kosmo
plot_es: A girl, who is in love with a man, refuses to enter an arranged marriage with someone else. When her beloved goes to war, she decides to enter a monastery, where she dies.
plot_en: A girl, who is in love with a man, refuses to enter an arranged marriage with someone else. When her beloved goes to war, she decides to enter a monastery, where she dies.
